name: Nano War (Flash Game Desktop Version)
description:
Nano War is a RTS/action game. (Classic Flash Game with 20M plays)

Release in 2007 on Kongregate.
NOTE : Download and play without Flash Plugin.

Inside the human body nanoscopic cells are fighting for the victory.

In Nano War, you have to annilihate the other entity. You are the blue entity, your opponent is red.

Also called Nano Wars or NanoWars but the real name is Nano War = Nanoscopic War :)
